name: Catch The Pokeboys: Kremlin Edition
description:
Have you ever been wondering how is it to catch cute pokeboys in church, while being chased by priests? If your answer is YES, so this game is absolutely for YOU!

This game is based on a real story about Ruslan Sokolovsky, who played Pokemon Go in church and was judged in Russia.  More details:  https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2017/may/11/pokemon-go-russian-youtuber-c...

This game is free spin-off version of this:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/915730/Catch_The_Kids_Priest_Simulator_Game/?...
